summary: Fixed the search bar tabindex issue by adding proper tabindex values to ensure logical tab order: search input (1), search button (2), category buttons (3-7), other/custom input (8), and quick completion pills (9-12). This improves keyboard navigation accessibility.
current_status: Search bar tabindex functionality has been fixed and is now properly ordered for keyboard navigation. The search interface now follows a logical tab flow starting with the main search input.
